titleStmt.title: Lingua, or, The combat of the tongue, and the five senses for superiority a pleasant comoedy.
titleStmt.author: Tomkis, Thomas, fl. 1604-1615.
Brewer, Anthony, fl. 1630-1655.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Thomas Tomkins by Halkett & Laing, BM and NUC pre-1956.
Formerly ascribed to Antony Brewer. Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
